name: Snap Trap
description: You attempt to snare the target in a snap trap. One creature in melee range must make a DEX save against your Move DC. On failure, the target takes 1d6 + MOVE grass damage and is grappled by you.
When this move is used as an attack of opportunity against a creature moving out of your range, the target makes the save at disadvantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.
